title: Gen. Milley: Trump is 'Fascist to the Core,' 'Wannabe Dictator'
summary: Highest-ranking military officer Gen. Mark Milley called Trump 'fascist to the core,' 'the most dangerous person to this country,' and a 'wannabe dictator' in retirement speech. Feared being court-martialed if Trump won in 2024.
keyFacts: Called Trump 'the most dangerous person to this country'
Retirement speech: Trump was a 'wannabe dictator'
'We don't take an oath to an individual. We take an oath to the Constitution'
Told Bob Woodward he feared being court-martialed if Trump won in 2024
Said he had 'suspicions' about Trump's mental decline
'Deeply convinced' Trump remained a danger after losing 2020
